doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Sayeba Akhter
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Sayeba Akhter is a Gynecologist in Dhaka. Her qualification is MBBS, FCPS (OBGYN), FCPS (PAK), FICMCH (IN), DRH (UK). She is a Former Professor, Gynecology & Obstetrics at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Sayeba Akhter at Popular Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi is 9:00am to 12:00pm (Sat & Wed).

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Rashida Khanom
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Rashida Khanom is a Gynecologist in Dhaka. Her qualification is MBBS, DGO (OBGYN), MCPS (OBGYN), FCPS (OBGYN). She is a Professor, Gynecology & Obstetrics at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Ibn Sina Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Rashida Khanom at Ibn Sina Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi is 6pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Kazi Foyeza Akther
doctor.specialty: Gynecology, Infertility & Painless Normal Delivery Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Kazi Foyeza Akther is a Painless Delivery Specialist in Dhaka. Her qualification is MBBS, FCPS (OBGYN), MCPS (OBGYN). She is a Consultant, Gynecology & Obstetrics at BRB Hospital, Dhaka. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at BRB Hospital, Dhaka. Practicing hour of Dr. Kazi Foyeza Akther at BRB Hospital, Dhaka is 9am to 6pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Kishwar Sultana
doctor.workplace: Holy Family Red Crescent Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Kishwar Sultana is a Gynecologist in Dhaka. Her qualification is MBBS, FCPS (OBGYN), MCPS (OBGYN), DGO (OBGYN). She is a Professor & Head, Gynecology & Obstetrics at Holy Family Red Crescent Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Medinova Medical Services, Malibagh. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Kishwar Sultana at Medinova Medical Services, Malibagh is 7pm to 9pm (Sun, Tue & Thu).

chamber.address: Gemcon Business Tower, 255 New Circular Road, Malibagh, Dhaka

doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Muna Shalima Jahan is a Gynecologist in Dhaka. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (OBGYN), MS (OBGYN). She is a Professor, Gynecology & Obstetrics at Sir Salimullah Medical College & Mitford Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Green Life Hospital, Dhaka. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Muna Shalima Jahan at Green Life Hospital, Dhaka is 5.30pm to 9pm (Sat, Sun, Tue & Thu).
